name: Difficult Stream
description:
Desktop: Click "Start" and keep your mouse cursor over the river; P or escape to pause. Mobile: Touch and hold "Start" and keep your finger over the river; let go to pause. Survive as long as possible without hitting the land (or anything else).

Made for Eevee's Games Made Quick 1½ game jam, with the theme "something ironic, such as difficult to stream".   Might be a bit too similar to my previous game (both are randomlyish-generated survive-as-long-as-possible games), but whatever.
